actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to require the Secretary of the Interior to determine the feasibility and desirability of designating the Illinois Trail as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to require the Secretary of the Interior to determine the feasibility and desirability of designating the Illinois Trail as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to require the Secretary of the Interior to determine the feasibility and desirability of designating the Illinois Trail as a national scenic trail.
